title: Eva Gabor | Love Island (1952, Adventure) directed by Bud Pollard | Colorized Movie

sources.title: Eva Gabor | Love Island (1952, Adventure) directed by Bud Pollard | Colorized Movie
sources.description:
Tropical thunderbolt of romance!
For Navy pilot Lt.Richard Tabor (Paul Valentine), it was the beginning of an adventure after being stranded on a Balinese island. While relating his story to his friend, the movie moves into a flashback mode where Dick gets to meet the beautiful sarong-swathed Sarna (Eva Gabor), a Balinese beauty. It was love at first sight for the Sarna and Dick.

Original title: Love Island (1952)

This film is available with subtitles in many language options.

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/YPcaIxTSBiw

Directors: Bud Pollard
Writer: John E. Gordon 
Stars: Paul Valentine, Eva Gabor, Malcolm Lee Beggs
Genre: Colorized, Drama, Comedy, Adventure, Romance


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
01:41 A tale of love, adventure, and family dynamics unfolds on a mysterious island named Tatara.
13:30 Love, marriage, and cultural differences explored in a conversation between Tamar and Lieutenant Richardtabber.
14:47 Exploration of cultural differences in a foreign land through customs and traditions.
23:48 Love, sacrifice, and power struggles unfold in a tale of family dynamics and societal expectations.
38:54 A daughter discovers her true identity and makes a heartbreaking promise to save her father.
45:13 Betrayal and jealousy unfold as a wedding gift leads to a lover's quarrel.
54:54 Drama unfolds as secrets are revealed on a deserted island, leading to unexpected twists.
